title: This is how long the average sex session lasts
text:
This is how long the average sex session lasts And how many times couples resort to having a 'quickie' Share 18 minutes in and things are looking sensual (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily     
How long does sex last for couples here in the UK? 
The average session is 19 minutes, according to a recent study. But don't be alarmed, chaps – that also includes foreplay. Ten minutes, to be exact. 
People told sex toy retailer Lovehoney that just over half (52 per cent) of intimate moments lasted 'the right' amount of time. 19 minutes seems fair, no? Just enough time to order a pizza and wait for it to arrive, essentially. Works out well. 
Just 15 per cent of women polled said they'd prefer a bit longer in bed. As ever, though, the study was restricted to a limited pool – 4,400 people this time. Sizeable, but worth remembering. Brian is struggling (Photo: Fotomedia RF) Read More The single worst thing men can do during sex 
Another interesting part of the sex survey is that couples said one in five sessions were 'quickies'. Time constraints – maybe the pizza came early? – often force lovers to go in and out like the SAS . 
The study also discovered that 89 per cent of couples have managed to orgasm at the same time. Quite a feat, especially considering a vast proportion of women (more than 11 per cent) can't orgasm by way of penetrative sex at all). 
Still. Researchers combated this point by saying that couples achieve shared orgasms by allowing one partner to get to the 'trigger point' and then waiting for the other to catch up. 
Three quarters of men said they orgasm almost every time they have sex, meanwhile, compared to 28 per cent of women. No surprises there. Like us on Facebook
